func.title: ExecutePXS

param.name: callback
param.desc: For each executed frame, call callback->Timer(i), 0 â‰¤ i < frames

func.desc: Advances PXS (flying material pixels) by the specified amount of frames. This is meant for rainy or snowy scenarios to start with a screen full of precipitation.
func.remark: The callback parameter is chosen to allow passing simple effects.

example.text: Creates a snowing effect and executes it for 100 frames so that the game starts with a snowy screen.
